visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar column chart displaying the total Winter Olympics medals earned for the top 5 countries. The chart should have a title, styled axes and labels, and specific data series for gold, silver, and bronze medals. Additionally, specify custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend.

title.text: Winter Olympic medals per existing country (TOP 5)

categories: United States

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a polar column chart that visualizes the total Winter Olympics medals earned by the top 5 countries. The chart is titled 'Winter Olympic medals per existing country (TOP 5)' and includes a subtitle linking to the source data on Wikipedia. The x-axis labels are styled with a specific font size and include country flags for visual enhancement. The y-axis is configured to display tick intervals of 25, ensuring clarity in the medal counts. The plot options for the columns include stacking, border settings, and padding adjustments to ensure a clean and visually appealing layout. The data series include separate entries for gold, silver, and bronze medals, each with specific data points corresponding to the top 5 countries. Custom colors are applied to differentiate the medal types, enhancing the visual distinction between them.
